3 Forms

Individual form controls receive styling, but without any required base class on the <form> or large changes in markup. Results in stacked, left-aligned labels on top of form controls.

3.1 Form

Form relative items should be included in form tag.

HTML markup
<form class="form">
 <fieldset>
 <legend class="form-caption"><h2>Sign in to Trend Micro Account</h2></legend>
 <div class="sign-in-container control-group error">
   <label class="form-label">Email</label>
   <div class="controls">
       <input type="text" class="input input-giant" placeholder="Email">
<div class="form-error">
    <span class="form-arrow"></span>
    <div class="form-error-message">
        Lorem ipsum In laboris ex deserunt magna qui Excepteur non sint nisi aliqua Ut fugiat sunt do fugiat.
    </div>
</div>
   </div>
   <label class="form-label">
     <input type="password" class="input input-giant" placeholder="Password">
<div class="form-error">
    <span class="form-arrow"></span>
    <div class="form-error-message">
        Lorem ipsum In laboris ex deserunt magna qui Excepteur non sint nisi aliqua Ut fugiat sunt do fugiat.
    </div>
</div>
   </label>
   <label class="form-label">
     <input id="remember-account" class="input form-checkbox" type="checkbox">
     <span data-i18n="web_threat_protection_block_dangerous_website">Remember me on this computer</span>
   </label>
   <button class="btn btn-large btn-ruby">Sign In</button>
   <div class="sign-in-help">
     <a href='#'>Forgot which address you used before</a>
   </div>
   <div class="sign-in-help">
     <a href="#">Forgot your password?</a>
   </div>
 </div>
 </fieldset>
</form>
normal
Original status

Sign in to Trend Micro Account
Lorem ipsum In laboris ex deserunt magna qui Excepteur non sint nisi aliqua Ut fugiat sunt do fugiat.
Forgot which address you used before
Forgot your password?

3.2.1 Input checkbox

Customized checkbox for better visibility.

HTML markup
<label class="form-label">
    <input data-js="checkbox-block-dangerous-website" class="input {$modifiers}" type="checkbox">
    <span data-i18n="web_threat_protection_block_dangerous_website">Sign me in!</span>
</label>
normal
Original status
.form-checkbox

customize checkbox

3.2.2 Input Radio

Customized radio button for better visibility.

HTML markup
<label class="form-label">
    <input data-js="" class="input {$modifiers}" type="radio">
    <span data-i18n="">Remember me on this computer</span>
</label>
normal
Original status
.form-radio

customize radio

3.4.1 Different input sizes

You could use different sizes of input on your UI with simple CSS class.

HTML markup
<label class="form-label">Text Field</label>
<input type="text" class="{$modifiers}">
normal
Original status
.input-mini

mini one

.input-small

small one

.input-medium

medium one

.input-large

large one

.input-xlarge

extra large

.input-xxlarge

largest one

.input-giant

Sometimes you might need a BIGGER input

3.4.2 Enable & Disabled status

HTML markup
<input name="input" id="input" type="text" class="input" {$modifiers}>
normal
Original status
disabled

Disbaled status, you should use disabled attribute to make it work perfectly.

3.5 Selector

Selector for single selection using

HTML markup
<select><option>Option 1</option></select>
normal
Original status

3.6 Error messages for Form elements

HTML markup
<div class="form-error">
    <span class="form-arrow"></span>
    <div class="form-error-message">
        Lorem ipsum In laboris ex deserunt magna qui Excepteur non sint nisi aliqua Ut fugiat sunt do fugiat.
    </div>
</div>
normal
Original status
Lorem ipsum In laboris ex deserunt magna qui Excepteur non sint nisi aliqua Ut fugiat sunt do fugiat.

3.7 AK input

AK input form

HTML markup
<div class="ak-input-group">
    <div><input id="ak1" name="ak1" maxlength="4" class="ak-input" type="text"></div>
    <div><span class="ak-input-space">-</span><input id="ak2" name="ak2" maxlength="4" class="ak-input" type="text"></div>
    <div><span class="ak-input-space">-</span><input id="ak3" name="ak3" maxlength="4" class="ak-input" type="text"></div>
    <div><span class="ak-input-space">-</span><input id="ak4" name="ak4" maxlength="4" class="ak-input" type="text"></div>
    <div><span class="ak-input-space">-</span><input id="ak5" name="ak5" maxlength="4" class="ak-input" type="text"></div>
</div>
normal
Original status
-
-
-
-
